summary: REQ-1 is partially implemented: an Admin link was added to the desktop top navigation and to the footer Quick Links. The mobile navigation Admin link cannot be confirmed from the provided (truncated) diff. Several unrelated changes appear in the diff summary (admin token/url param utilities and other admin-auth related behavior) that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Mobile navigation includes an "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login".
missing_requirements.reason: TopNav.tsx is truncated in the mobile menu section, and the visible portion does not include an Admin link. Therefore the mobile navigation AC cannot be verified as implemented from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified URL parameter utilities that reference admin token storage/events (ADMIN_TOKEN_KEY, ADMIN_TOKEN_CHANGE_EVENT) and related session persistence/cleanup logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to restore an Admin entry point link in the public UI; it does not request changes to admin token handling or URL param/session storage utilities.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed a "caffeine.ai" referral link section in the footer (including appIdentifier hostname encoding and external link markup).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requests adding an Admin link entry point; it does not request adding or changing footer referral/attribution links.
